Kyrgyzstan and China continue to promote cooperation in humanitarian sphere , says in the Declaration on the further deepening of the strategic partnership signed between President of the Kyrgyz Republic Almazbek Atambayev and President Xi Jinping .

Under the document , the parties declared that they would continue all - round promotion of cooperation in culture , education , health , science and technology , sports , tourism , environmental protection and other humanitarian fields .
